name: Pass The Torch
description:
Pass the Torch is a puzzle platformer. The aim of the game is to guide both players to the door to the next level while lighting the tiki torches beside the door.

HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD to move and space to jump
  • Press "f" to pickup torches, interact with the statue and light tiki torches
  • press "e" to switch character
  • the goal is to get both players standing at the door with both torches lit

The game was made by Jamie Hyland, Robert Brannigan and John Flood. Enjoy!!
